sources.title: A Nanny for Christmas | Full Christmas Movie 2023 | Emmanuelle Vaugier | Dean Cain
sources.description:
The lives of a smart young career woman, a Beverly Hills advertising executive mom, and a tough-guy company owner intertwine for a Christmas that could change everyone's lives forever.
2010.  Stars: Emmanuelle Vaugier, Dean Cain, Richard Ruccolo

metadata.Plot: Ally is a smart young career woman who needs a new job. Samantha is a busy Beverly Hills advertising executive/mom whose too-well-mannered kids need some fun in their lives. And Danny Donner is the tough-guy owner of a chocolate company who wants a major ad campaign immediately. Could these three lives intertwining lead to the Christmas that changes everyone's worlds forever?
metadata.Writer: Michael Ciminera, Richard Gnolfo, Jeffrey Schenck
metadata.Actors: Emmanuelle Vaugier, Dean Cain, Richard Ruccolo
